channel.title: RSPS - Is dicing good or bad for your server? [Poll]
channel.description: I am having a debate, need opinions. Is dicing good for your server because it 'keeps the players entertained,' or bad because it can make so many people quit and be astronomical to your economy? Comment your opinions below, please.

item.title: RSPS - Is dicing good or bad for your server? [Poll]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

It isn’t so much that it is a “bad feature” as the factor is that “people make it a scammable feature” Fix the scams, it’s a nice feature. People have to learn how to be responsible and have good sportsmanship when they lose bank cause they willingly bet it all.

Read full topic
item.source: RSPS - Is dicing good or bad for your server? [Poll]

item.title: RSPS - Is dicing good or bad for your server? [Poll]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

A server I know is literally built around gambling. I haven’t checked it out too much, but the player count seems rather stable and there’s lots of donations coming in.

It’s a “highly-sought-after” feature ever since runescape essentially abolished any form of player games of chance.

Read full topic
item.source: RSPS - Is dicing good or bad for your server? [Poll]

item.title: RSPS - Is dicing good or bad for your server? [Poll]
item.dc:creator: @Welliton_inc Welliton_inc
item.description:
@Welliton_inc wrote:

Dicing only plays a significant part in a server when the server itself is not very unique.

item.title: RSPS - Is dicing good or bad for your server? [Poll]
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

When I introduced dicing into my server a lot of players quit or raged the week after, even a few players that been with us for months ended up quiting. Also some people suddently had large amount of cash and were completely bored after, only to stand at home talking to other players instead of trying to make money for a certain item.

Read full topic

item.description:

It’s just stupid either way it will make people quit… Players would get bored and complain about no dicing, they will get cleaned and quit or get so rich is boring.
